Naruto combines his Truth-Seeking Balls and kicks the single large ball towards the opponent with great force. 

== Trivia ==
* In the manga and anime, Naruto had kicked a Truth-Seeking Ball belonging to [[Madara]] back at him when he attempted to finish off [[Might Guy]].
